decks.notes: This deck focuses on ramping up quickly using lands like Simic Growth Chamber and The Mycosynth Gardens, with the help of Amulet of Vigor to untap them. The goal is to utilize Primeval Titan to search for key lands like Valakut, the Molten Pinnacle and Lotus Field, and then combo off using Scapeshift to deal massive damage. The deck also includes cards like Aftermath Analyst to draw more cards and Cultivator Colossus to provide additional ramp. Overall, the strategy revolves around assembling the right lands and utilizing Primeval Titan efficiently to overwhelm the opponent.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of spells and abilities to quickly assemble and activate the Goblin Charbelcher combo, allowing for a powerful and efficient win condition without the reliance on traditional lands. Key cards like Hydroelectric Specimen and Thundertrap Trainer help to control the board and disrupt the opponent's plans, while cards like Lotus Bloom and Whir of Invention provide the necessary resources to execute the combo. By utilizing a mix of counterspells, card draw, and tutors, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The key concept of this Mono Black Control deck is to maintain control over the game by utilizing powerful black spells and creatures to disrupt the opponent's strategy and remove threats from the board. The deck focuses on hand disruption with cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek, while also utilizing powerful finishers like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Necrodominance. The deck includes removal spells like Fatal Push and Fell the Profane to deal with opposing threats, while also utilizing card advantage with Castle Locthwain and Agadeem's Awakening. The goal is to outvalue the opponent and take control of the game's tempo.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly generate mana and spells using cards like Pyretic Ritual, Manamorphose, and Ruby Medallion to cast powerful spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage and Past in Flames. The deck aims to chain together spells and rituals to build towards a lethal combo turn and overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells. The inclusion of Wish allows for versatility in finding the right spell for the situation, while cards like Glimpse the Impossible provide additional card advantage. The deck also has some land destruction elements with cards like Elegant Parlor and Valakut Awakening.

The primary focus of this deck is to establish strong control over the game by utilizing the UrzaTron lands to generate substantial amounts of mana. This mana is then used to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures and impactful colorless spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer provide additional disruption, while Karn, the Great Creator offers versatile utility options. By assembling the UrzaTron lands, the deck can quickly overwhelm opponents with its powerful threats and efficient control elements.

Utilizing the UrzaTron lands to quickly ramp up mana, this control deck focuses on disrupting opponents with cards like Thought-Knot Seer and Kozilek's Command while also presenting threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and Ugin, the Spirit Dragon. The deck aims to control the game with powerful spells and use Karn, the Great Creator to shut down opponent's strategies with artifacts like Trinisphere and Avarice Totem. With a mix of removal, disruption, and powerful finishers, this deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents in grindy games.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. Key cards include Ajani, Nacatl Pariah, Bonecrusher Giant, and Lightning Bolt to control the board and deal direct damage. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Blood Moon and Static Prison to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion allows for additional value and consistency in the deck. Overall, the strategy of this deck is to maintain pressure on the opponent while efficiently dealing damage to secure victory.

This Boros Aggro deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive creatures and burn spells while utilizing Jegantha as a companion for additional value. The deck includes powerful creatures like Amped Raptor and Ocelot Pride alongside burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Galvanic Discharge to quickly close out games. The inclusion of Goblin Bombardment provides additional reach and removal options. The mana base is designed to support the deck's aggressive strategy with efficient lands like Sacred Foundry and fast mana sources like Aether Hub. The deck aims to be fast and resilient, putting pressure on opponents from the very start.

This deck aims to quickly assemble the Allosaurus Rider combo, using Chancellor of the Tangle to accelerate the process. By casting Allosaurus Rider for free with the help of cards like Neoform and Eldritch Evolution, players can then tutor for powerful creatures like Griselbrand or Autochthon Wurm to close out the game. The deck also utilizes cards like Pact of Negation and Summoner's Pact to protect the combo, while having access to additional utility creatures and card selection tools to ensure consistency in executing the combo.
